Package gameMain.difficulty

Class DifficultyFactory

java.lang.Object
gameMain.difficulty.DifficultyFactory
public class DifficultyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Factory of the Difficulty Screen (FlyWeight Pattern). Responsible for reducing the number of objects by only creating the MVC of the game if there isn't any duplicated.
